title: how many games have u gays lose in a roll??
body:
i have lost around 12 games in a roll since last friday, terrible chrismas!!! i wonder if riot just try to fk my life up or their staff memebers are so dumb to team me with all kinds of noob.


and what more fun is that after my team mate feed and build terriblely( vlad with{{item:3027}} ) (or even afk in some games)

they just blame me and report me for verbal abusing only cause i want them to play safe and try not to be bad (no dirty words r used)

so what should i do? just quit this game lol~~

or just any one has lost 20 games in a roll?

replies.body: mateee I know the feeling I was p5 last season and in placements I got on a mad tilt and now im in silver 2 and still on mass tilt trying to woosaa and stop rageing at my team
have a kit kat, chill out
Hahaha mate, you're just on a really bad tilt. It happens.

just like chill out take a day off playing, ride a bike eat some good food, then come back fresh and positive, play a comfort pick and try to get a win without even talking to much to your team, every time I get on a losing streak its more or less the thought of loosing again that makes me loose. So changing your attitude can help immensely, I remember one time I was on a huge loosing streak right after I got back from holiday and had forgotten how to play the game (not really but kinda) and so I just took a rest and came back in not thinking about the losses and after a game or two I had a win and that totally got me going and turned it into quite a few wins in a row. Good luck and have fun.

Man i hate it when those gays make you lose.. lol

If your tilting though, just play some norms till you feel like you've had a good break
its normals but the problem is that they cannot just dothings like this
